remark: Vanderbilt is a great school with a great food! It is sixth in the nation for best campus food.
Located in the music city Nashville, music flourishes at Vanderbilt! Broadway is a good place to go!
Jiayi would like to achieve her full potentials at Vanderbilt:)
"Vanderbilt values most highly intellectual freedom that supports open inquiry, equality, compassion, and excellence in all endeavors."
Blair school is one of the only exclusively undergraduate music schools in the country! That means you can have more opportunity to perform as an undergraduate student!
Vanderbilt has the happiest students in the United States!
As a Vanderbilt student, you can go to Centennial Park and visit "Parthenon" whenever you want!
